Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルっていい奴だな…… 義理がたいし……
Entry.EnglishText: That Igor is a great guy... He sure knows how to return a favor...

Entry.JapaneseText: イゴルさんに会えなかったら、今ごろは まだラジルダで途方に暮れてたでしょうね。
Entry.EnglishText: Had we not met him, we'd probably still be stuck back in Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 義理と人情を忘れかけた、このすさんだ世界に、 あんなヤツはなかなかいないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: Guys like him are hard to find in this mad world where gratitude and compassion have been abandoned.
Entry.Notes: Maybe a bit of a reach for Giri but I'm not sure Duty or Obligation really fit in the context of Igor paying them back

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>さん、 そういうの好きそうですもんね。
Entry.EnglishText: You seem to like those sorts of things.

Entry.JapaneseText: おうよ、義理人情なくして、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>は務まらねぇぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, anyone lacking a heart and conscience isn't fit to be called <Yellow>Human<White>!
